title: Ticket #79: Implement ERROR exemption system for tests
description: Some tests generate ERROR prints into the log and its OK. Most famous case are 2 of the 4 protocol negotiation tests which are intended to fail. For test to pass these prints have to occur. So we can't flag an error on the test and have to have an exemption system.
remarks:
2009-Jan-23 14:04:54 by matt:
For those two tests the lack of "ERROR" in the logs would actually signal a failure, correct? Seems you should have a way to invert the ERROR check on those tests. I'm not sure if the core check should be inverted -- when would you expect a core!

Added exemption system and initially exempted all messages in protocol test 1 and 4.
